PROFILE

I build digital products by combining design, development, and marketing skills.

I help companies reach their business goals by making beautiful, user-centric and performant software.

I have more than 10 years of experience designing & developing applications and websites.

Product manager with experience managing 2 software startups and a web development agency.

  • Javascript
  • User Experience Design
  • Product Management
  • User Interface Design
  • Marketing
FEATURED PROJECT
Hockeysticks

Worked remotely as a part of the founding team, responsible for Hockeysticks project. Developed Hockeysticks, an internal app used by the management of a San Francisco web publishing company. Implemented importing and management of the revenues made from various video ad networks and expenses spent on ads along with system which takes into account data about visitors to the site received from sites like Google Analytics. It had ad optimization intelligence, helping the user decide on which ads to spend the money to improve impressions and profit from advertisements that belong to the same network of blog sites.

 Client:
Action Factory
 Location:
San Francisco, USA
